transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Hello Mukesh ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Mukesh ji aap free ho aap baat kar lenge?
Customer: Kaam to kar rahe hain already chalo batao kya.
Executive: Sir mujhe aap se discussion karni thi ki aap na apna jo PNS call hota hai na sir wo aap miss kar rahe hain aap call nahi pick kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Kya kehna chah rahe ho?
Executive: Sir aapke paas jo buyers ki call aa rahi hai na sir.
Customer: Sir ye mera call aa raha hai usko attend karna padega mujhe kya kehna chah rahe ho.
[unintelligible]: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
[unintelligible]: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is missing PNS calls.

- Customer needs to attend another call.



Resolution:

- The call was put on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pns call, buyleads, hold
